introduction.title: 1. Introduction and Acceptance
introduction.content:
Welcome to CVeetje. These Terms of Service ("Terms") apply to the use of the CVeetje website and services (together the "Service"), operated by CVeetje ("we", "us" or "our").

By creating an account, using the Service or purchasing credits, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not use the Service.

We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes become effective as soon as they are published on the website. It is your responsibility to regularly review these Terms. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Description of the Service
serviceDescription.content:
CVeetje is an AI-powered CV generator that helps users create professional CVs. The Service includes:

• Parsing and storing profile information (such as LinkedIn data)
• Analyzing job postings
• Generating tailored CVs using AI
• Generating visual styles and formatting
• Downloading CVs as PDF
• Optionally generating cover letters
• Exporting LinkedIn-optimized content

The Service uses external AI providers (such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Google) via API keys provided by the user. CVeetje is not an AI provider and does not offer direct AI models.

accountRegistration.title: 3. Account and Registration
accountRegistration.content:
To use the Service you must create an account. By registering you agree to:

• Provide accurate, current and complete information
• Keep your account credentials confidential
• Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
• Be responsible for all activities that occur under your account

You must be at least 16 years old to use the Service. If you are under 18 years old, you must have permission from a parent or guardian.

We reserve the right to refuse, terminate or suspend accounts at our sole discretion, particularly in case of violation of these Terms.

creditsAndPayments.title: 4. Credits and Payments
creditsAndPayments.content1:
CVeetje operates with a credit system:

• Each new user receives 5 free credits per month
• Free credits are reset on the first day of each month
• Unused free credits expire at the end of the month
• Purchased credits do not expire and are added to your balance
• Downloading a CV costs 1 credit
• Generating a cover letter costs 1 extra credit
• Generating LinkedIn export content costs 1 credit
creditsAndPayments.content2:
Credits can be purchased via Mollie, our payment provider. Available packages:

• 5 credits for €4.99
• 15 credits for €12.99
• 30 credits for €22.99

All prices include VAT. Payments are processed in euros.
creditsAndPayments.content3:
Purchased credits are non-refundable, except in the following cases:

• Technical errors on our part that make it impossible to use purchased credits
• Duplicate charges due to a payment error

Refund requests must be submitted within 14 days of purchase via our contact form. Free credits are not eligible for refund or compensation.

apiKeys.title: 5. API Keys and External Services
apiKeys.content:
The Service requires you to provide your own API key from a supported AI provider (such as OpenAI, Anthropic or Google).

By providing an API key:

• You confirm that you are authorized to use the relevant API
• You agree to the terms and conditions of the relevant AI provider
• You understand that you are responsible for all costs arising from the use of your API key via our Service
• You understand that the quality of AI-generated content depends on the chosen AI provider and model

Your API key is stored encrypted and is only used to generate content on your behalf. We do not have access to the unencrypted key and cannot view it.

userContent.title: 6. User Content and Data
userContent.content1:
You retain all rights to the content you upload or enter into the Service, including:

• Profile data and work experience
• Uploaded images and documents
• Job posting texts you paste

By uploading content, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide license to process this content for the purpose of providing the Service to you.
userContent.content2:
CVs, cover letters and other content generated by the Service are owned by you. You may use, modify and distribute generated content at your discretion.

We do not retain copies of generated content after it has been delivered to you, unless you choose to save your CV in your account.
userContent.content3:
Your account data and saved profiles are stored in Firebase (Google Cloud). You can at any time:

• View and delete your saved profiles
• Delete your account and all associated data

See our Privacy Policy for more information about how we process your data.

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content:
The Service, including the software, website, logos, and all associated intellectual property rights, are owned by CVeetje or its licensors.

You receive a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the Service for personal, non-commercial purposes.

It is not permitted to:

• Copy, modify or reverse-engineer the source code of the Service
• Use the Service to build a competing service
• Resell or sublicense the Service
• Use our trademarks or logos without written permission

prohibitedUse.title: 8. Prohibited Use
prohibitedUse.content:
You agree not to use the Service for:

• Creating fraudulent, misleading or false CVs
• Infringing the rights of third parties, including intellectual property rights
• Uploading illegal, harmful or offensive content
• Circumventing security measures or disrupting the Service
• Automated access to the Service (scraping, bots) without our permission
• Reselling credits or account access to third parties
• Sharing your account with others

Violation of these provisions may result in immediate termination of your account without refund.

disclaimers.title: 9. Disclaimers and Limitations
disclaimers.content1:
The Service is provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties, express or implied. We do not guarantee that:

• The Service will operate uninterrupted or error-free
• AI-generated content is accurate, complete or suitable for any purpose
• The Service will meet your specific expectations
disclaimers.content2:
Content generated by AI models may contain errors, inaccuracies or inappropriate formulations. It is your responsibility to:

• Review all generated content before using it
• Verify factual information
• Adjust content where necessary

We are not responsible for the outcomes of job applications or for decisions made based on content generated by the Service.
disclaimers.content3:
To the extent permitted by law, CVeetje is not liable for:

• Indirect, incidental, special or consequential damages
• Loss of data, profits or business opportunities
• Damage resulting from the use of or inability to use the Service
• Costs arising from API use with third parties

Our total liability is limited to the amount you have paid us for the Service in the preceding 12 months.

termination.title: 10. Termination
termination.content:
You can terminate your account at any time by contacting us or by deleting your account in the settings.

We may terminate or suspend your account:

• In case of violation of these Terms
• In case of suspected fraudulent or unauthorized use
• If the Service is discontinued

Upon termination:

• You lose access to your account and stored data
• Unused credits expire (both free and purchased)
• Your personal data is deleted in accordance with our Privacy Policy

changes.title: 11. Changes to the Service
changes.content:
We reserve the right to at any time:

• Add, modify or remove features
• Adjust prices (changes do not apply to already purchased credits)
• Temporarily or permanently discontinue the Service

In case of significant changes we will inform you via email or via the Service.

governingLaw.title: 12. Governing Law and Disputes
governingLaw.content:
These Terms are governed by Dutch law.

Disputes arising from or related to these Terms or the Service shall be submitted to the competent court in the Netherlands.

Before initiating a dispute, we request that you first contact us to try to resolve the dispute through mutual agreement.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content:
CVeetje ("we", "us" or "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your data when you use our website and services.

This policy applies to all users of CVeetje, including visitors to our website and registered users of our service.

By using CVeetje, you agree to the processing of your data as described in this privacy policy.

dataController.title: 2. Data Controller
dataController.content:
CVeetje is a service of GroeimetAI and is the data controller for the personal data collected through our service.

Business details:
GroeimetAI
Fabriekstraat 20
7311GP Apeldoorn
The Netherlands

Chamber of Commerce (KvK): 90102304
VAT number: NL004787305B79
Email: info@groeimetai.io

For questions about this privacy policy or the processing of your personal data, you can contact us at the email address above.

dataCollection.title: 3. What Data We Collect
dataCollection.content1:
When you create an account, we collect:

• Email address
• Name (if provided)
• Profile photo (if you sign in via Google or Apple)
• Password (stored encrypted)

If you sign in via Google or Apple, we receive certain profile data from these services in accordance with their privacy policies.
dataCollection.content2:
To generate CVs, we collect the information you enter:

• Personal details (name, contact information, location)
• Work experience and job descriptions
• Education and certifications
• Skills and competencies
• Profile photos you upload
• LinkedIn profile data (if you paste or import it)
• Screenshots or documents of old CVs

You determine what information you enter. We recommend only sharing information that is relevant to your CV.
dataCollection.content3:
We automatically collect certain information about your use of the service:

• IP address and device information
• Browser type and version
• Pages you visit and features you use
• Date and time of your visits
• Referrer information (how you came to us)

This data is anonymized for analytical purposes.

dataUsage.title: 4. How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content:
We use your data for the following purposes:

• Providing our service: Generating CVs, cover letters and LinkedIn content based on your profile data.

• Account management: Creating and managing your account, processing payments, and tracking your credit balance.

• Communication: Sending important service messages, such as purchase confirmations or changes to our terms.

• Improving the service: Analyzing usage patterns to improve our service (anonymized data only).

• Fraud prevention: Detecting and preventing fraudulent or unauthorized use.

• Legal obligations: Complying with legal obligations, such as tax administration for payments.

legalBasis.title: 5. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content:
We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds (in accordance with GDPR):

• Performance of a contract: Processing is necessary for providing the service you requested (Article 6(1)(b) GDPR).

• Consent: For certain processing we ask for your explicit consent, for example for storing your profile data (Article 6(1)(a) GDPR).

• Legitimate interest: For improving our service and preventing fraud, taking into account your interests and rights (Article 6(1)(f) GDPR).

• Legal obligation: For complying with legal obligations, such as tax legislation (Article 6(1)(c) GDPR).

dataSharing.title: 6. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content:
We do not sell your personal data to third parties. We only share your data in the following situations:

• With service providers: See section 7 for an overview of the external services we use.

• With AI providers: When you generate a CV, your profile data is processed by the AI provider whose API key you provided (such as OpenAI, Anthropic or Google). This happens directly with your own API key.

• When legally required: If we are legally obligated to do so, for example by a court order.

• In case of business transfer: In the event of a merger, acquisition or sale of assets, your data may be transferred to the new owner.

thirdPartyServices.title: 7. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content1:
We use Firebase from Google for:

• Authentication (login and account management)
• Database (storage of your profiles and CVs)
• Hosting of certain services

Firebase processes data in accordance with Google's privacy policy. Data may be stored in data centers within the EU or US. Google is certified under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework.

More information: https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy
thirdPartyServices.content2:
We use Mollie for processing payments. When you purchase credits, your payment details are processed directly by Mollie. We only receive confirmation of payment, not your full payment details.

Mollie is based in the Netherlands and processes data in accordance with GDPR.

More information: https://www.mollie.com/en/privacy
thirdPartyServices.content3:
For generating CV content, we use AI models via your own API key. The following providers are supported:

• OpenAI (ChatGPT, GPT-4)
• Anthropic (Claude)
• Google (Gemini)

When you generate content, your profile data and job posting text are sent to your chosen AI provider. This processing falls under the privacy policy and terms of the respective provider.

We recommend reading the privacy policy of your chosen AI provider before using the service.

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Local Storage
cookies.content:
CVeetje makes limited use of cookies and local storage:

• Essential cookies: For the functioning of the website and remembering your login status. These are strictly necessary and do not require consent.

• Preferences: Your language preference and theme setting (light/dark) are stored locally in your browser.

• Authentication: Firebase places cookies for managing your login session.

We do not use tracking cookies or advertising cookies. We do not share cookie data with third parties for marketing purposes.

You can block cookies via your browser settings, but this may limit the functionality of the website.

dataRetention.title: 9. Data Retention
dataRetention.content:
We do not retain your data longer than necessary:

• Account data: Retained as long as your account is active. Upon deletion of your account, your data is permanently deleted within 30 days.

• Profile data: Retained as long as you save them in your account. You can delete profiles yourself at any time.

• Generated CVs: Retained in your account until you delete them or terminate your account.

• Transaction data: Retained for 7 years in accordance with legal requirements (tax legislation).

• Log data: Anonymized or deleted after 90 days.

yourRights.title: 10. Your Rights
yourRights.content:
Under the GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

• Right of access: You can request what data we process about you.

• Right to rectification: You can have incorrect data corrected.

• Right to erasure: You can request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten").

• Right to restriction: You can request restriction of the processing of your data.

• Right to portability: You can request your data in a structured format to transfer to another service.

• Right to object: You can object to processing based on legitimate interest.

• Right to withdraw consent: You can withdraw previously given consent at any time.

To exercise these rights, you can contact us at info@groeimetai.io. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

You also have the right to file a complaint with the Dutch Data Protection Authority (https://autoriteitpersoonsgegevens.nl) or your local supervisory authority.

dataTransfers.title: 11. International Transfers
dataTransfers.content:
Your data may be processed outside the European Economic Area (EEA), specifically:

• By Firebase/Google (US): Google is certified under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework and uses Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs).

• By AI providers (US): OpenAI, Anthropic and Google are all based in the US. Processing takes place with your own API key and under the terms of the respective provider.

We take appropriate measures to ensure an adequate level of protection in accordance with Chapter V of the GDPR.

security.title: 12. Security
security.content:
We take the security of your data seriously and have implemented appropriate technical and organizational measures:

• Encryption: All data is transmitted encrypted (HTTPS/TLS). API keys are stored encrypted with AES-256 encryption.

• Access control: Only authorized personnel have access to systems containing personal data.

• Infrastructure: We use secure cloud infrastructure (Google Cloud/Firebase) with enterprise-grade security.

• Passwords: Passwords are stored hashed and are not accessible in plain text.

Despite these measures, no method of data transmission or storage can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. If you suspect your data has been compromised, please contact us immediately.

children.title: 13. Children
children.content:
CVeetje is not intended for children under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under this age.

If you are a parent or guardian and discover that your child has provided us with data without your consent, please contact us. We will immediately delete the data.

changes.title: 14. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content:
We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal reasons.

In case of significant changes, we will:

• Update the "last updated" date at the top of this policy
• Inform you by email if you have an account
• Show a notification in the application

We recommend regularly reviewing this privacy policy. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
